name: Responsive web design
description: Optimizing a website's layout and functionality to ensure it looks and works well on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.

name: Cross-browser compatibility
description: Ensuring that a website's layout and features work consistently across all modern web browsers, including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge.

name: Search engine optimization
description: Optimizing a website's content and structure to help it appear at the top of search engine results pages (SERPs) for relevant keywords and queries.

name: Website maintenance and updates
description: Ongoing management and upkeep of a website, including backend updates, content updates, bug fixes, and security updates.

name: CMS integration
description: Integrating a content management system (CMS) such as WordPress or Drupal into a website to help manage and control its content, as well as simplify ongoing maintenance.

name: E-commerce development
description: Designing and developing an online store with features such as product listings, shopping carts, and payment gateways to facilitate online transactions.

name: Custom WordPress development
description: Building custom WordPress themes and plugins to extend the functionality of a WordPress website beyond what is offered by default.

name: UI/UX design
description: Designing a website's user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) to ensure it is visually appealing, easy to use, and meets the needs of its target audience.
